description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6.00m in depth, maximum height of 3.70m and eaves height of 2.80m)
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule  2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The Fire Safety Information has been assessed by Officers and provides sufficient detail to ensure that fire safety measures have been incorporated into the development in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021.

The submitted existing and proposed floor plans do not show the  entire plan of main building.Please provide existing and proposed floor plans at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for the proposed works. The plans must also show the direction of North. Although the inclusion of a scale bar is not mandatory, it is encouraged.
